content: this legal text summarizes a case involving multiple parties and the division of inherited assets the assets include apartments and properties located in municipality castelfidardo the parties involved are identified by initials the deceased mr cl had various assets including a motor vehicle and funds in an account the parties have agreed to divide the assets among themselves with each party receiving a specific share the value of each share is specified and any remaining balances are to be paid by the respective parties there is also mention of a mortgage and the release of any claims related to it the expenses of the case will be shared equally among the parties the text concludes with the parties signing the document in the presence of a notary
